extendedInfo.description: If you are Ashes Remain's fan, this app is right for you. Whenever you want to check Ashes Remain's lyrics, just open this app and choose the lyrics that you want. You don't have to access the internet to get the lyrics. We provide all Ashes Remain's lyrics here. In the Album tab, you can choose lyrics based on the album. In All lyrics tab, all of Ashes Remain's lyrics are here. You can quickly search the lyrics by using the search bar at the top of the page.Hope you guy enjoy using this app as much as I enjoy developing it. :)-------------------------------- Main Features -------------------------------- - Lyrics categorized by album - Show all lyrics - Search lyrics-------------------------------- List of albums -------------------------------- - What I've Become-------------------------------- List of lyrics -------------------------------- - Change My Life- Come Alive- End Of Me- Everything Good- I Won't Run Away- Inside Of Me- Keep Me Breathing- On My Own- Right Here- Take It Away- Unbroken- Without You
